item.title: Respecting the eland
item.summary: Tamme explains that his people respect the eland ('with certain observances').
item.comments: 1) The |xam narratives contain numerous references to their respect for the eland (see Ssa ka Kumm in |xam Books V-17 and V-18 ), 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-10
item.author: Tamme (XII)

keyword.subkw: for the eland and observances of the !kun
